name: Bug Triage Process
description: Workflow for triaging and prioritizing bug reports

nodes.title: Bug Reported
nodes.description: A new bug report has been submitted

nodes.title: Reproduce Bug
nodes.description: Attempt to reproduce the reported issue

nodes.title: Close as Invalid
nodes.description: Bug cannot be reproduced, closing ticket

nodes.title: Prioritize & Assign
nodes.description: Set priority and assign to developer

nodes.title: Ready for Development
nodes.description: Bug is triaged and ready for a developer to fix
